#summary Information about the hardware in fx-9860G and fx-9860G SD

= fx-9860G SD =

== CPU ==
Renesas SuperH 32bit RISC processor
* Identified as SH7337. Possibly based on this microprocessor http://www.renesas.com/fmwk.jsp?cnt=sh7727_root.jsp&fp=/products/mpumcu/superh_family/sh7700_series/sh7727_group/
* [http://documentation.renesas.com/eng/products/mpumcu/rej09b0317_sh_3sm.pdf Manual]
* [http://documentation.renesas.com/eng/products/mpumcu/rej09b0082_sh7705.pdf Possible DataSheet]

== Memory ==
Spansion S29JL032H (4MB)
  * 32 Megabit (4 M x 8-Bit/2 M x16-Bit) CMOS 3.0 Volt-only, Simultaneous Read/Write Flash Memory
  * [http://www.spansion.com/products/S29JL032H.html Datasheet]


Amic LP62S16256F-T Series (512kB)
  * 256K X 16 BIT LOW VOLTAGE CMOS SRAM
  * [http://www.amictechnology.com/pdf/LP62S16256F-T.pdf Datasheet]
